title: Whimsical Emerald & Diamond Ear Climber - 'Mayuri' Inspired Karnaphool
features: Inspired by the Mayuri (Peacock) motif, these ear climbers feature a graceful, feathered design. A central oval-cut emerald takes prominence, surrounded by a cascade of diamonds and colour change sapphires in hues of pink, yellow and brown. The ear climbers are designed for a comfortable and secure fit, gracefully tracing the curve of the ear. Crafted with the finest Hyderabadi gold polishing techniques. The Colour Change Sapphires display a range of shades, adding depth and intrigue.
description: A modern interpretation of traditional Indian motifs, these ear climbers offer a unique and eye-catching statement. The combination of emeralds, rubies, colour change sapphires, and diamonds creates a luxurious and vibrant aesthetic. The secure ear climber design ensures comfortable wear, while the Hyderabadi polish enhances the gold's luster and brilliance. The natural gemstones ensure the quality and value. A perfect blend of modern design and traditional artistry.
